name: baby kimono
notes:
update!  a new version of this pattern is now available including sizes to fit preemie, 14" and 16" chests.

a sweet little cardi for, this simple crossover front top is easy to knit with just a little shaping and seaming required.  knitted in a soft dk baby yarn, you will also need two buttons and length of baby ribbon for the inside fastening.

will fit a baby less than 5lbs, approx 12"/30cm chest.  actual chest measurement of finished cardi is approx 15"/ 38cm.  additional sizes to fit 14"/36cm chest (finished size 16"/41cm) and 16"/41cm chest (finished size 18"/46cm).

this pattern is also available in italian via [tricotting][1].  many thanks to barbara ajroldi for this translation.

now available in french via [lililila][2].  many thanks to lililila for this translation.


  [1]: http://www.tricotting.com/1/post/2012/04/baby-kimono-di-betty-knitter.html
  [2]: http://lililila.canalblog.com/archives/2014/11/29/31050614.html
